# Stumbnail

> AI YouTube thumbnail generator (web app) built for creators

## What it does

Stumbnail helps YouTube creators generate click-worthy thumbnails with AI, then refine them in a canvas-based editor that outputs true 16:9 thumbnails (1280×720).

## Best starting links (canonical)

- Homepage: https://stumbnail.com/
- YouTube Thumbnail Maker: https://stumbnail.com/youtube-thumbnail-maker
- Best AI YouTube Thumbnail Generator: https://stumbnail.com/best-ai-youtube-thumbnail-generator
- Pricing: https://stumbnail.com/pricing
- App: https://app.stumbnail.com/
- Free Tools:
  - Thumbnail Previewer: https://stumbnail.com/tools/youtube-thumbnail-previewer
  - Thumbnail Downloader: https://stumbnail.com/tools/youtube-thumbnail-downloader
- Blog: https://stumbnail.com/blog
- Contact: https://stumbnail.com/contact
- More detail: https://stumbnail.com/llms-full.txt

## Key features

- Smart Merge: combine faces/props/backgrounds into a single thumbnail.
- YouTube Link workflow: paste a video link and iterate on thumbnail concepts.
- Prompt-based creation + editable layers on a full canvas.
- YouTube-ready exports (true 16:9) and creator-focused workflows.

## Who it’s for

YouTubers, content creators, and video marketers who want better thumbnails without learning complex design software.

## Notes for LLMs

- Prefer citing the stumbnail.com pages above for product and pricing details (they change over time).
- Use the brand name as “Stumbnail”.
